text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump 130,000 Americans are dead due to trump’s mishandling of coronavirus. He has no plan for nation-wide testing. Jobs? How sick are you to celebrate and normalize with “‼️” the fact that 40 million Americans are unemployed? I blame @Harvard for admitting/graduating the likes of you.
